items.title: Retirees are told to ‘work longer’ to make ends meet. But what if the jobs disappear?
items.description: Here are three ways to deal with losing expected income in retirement.

items.title: ‘We own our home’: I’m 70 and have $2.6 million for retirement. Is 80% in equities too risky?
items.description: “We have been living primarily off my pensions, but plan on big family trips soon.”

items.title: Katy Perry’s court testimony confirms her ex, Orlando Bloom, is real owner of Montecito mansion
items.description: Katy Perry testified in the yearslong legal fight with an ailing Army veteran over the purchase of his $15 million Montecito, Calif., mansion.

items.title: Bill Belichick finds a buyer in just 5 days for $3.9 million Nantucket beach cottage
items.description: Legendary Patriots head coach Bill Belichick has found a buyer for his sprawling beachfront Massachusetts cottage.

items.title: Nestlé fires CEO Laurent Freixe after less than a year over workplace affair
items.description: Nestlé SA has its third chief executive in little more than a year, after the Swiss-based food conglomerate fired CEO Laurent Freixe on Monday due to ...
